text: Ndipo anthu okhala ku Paradiso adzaitana anthu a ku Moto. “Ndithudi chimene adatilonjeza ife Ambuye wathu tachipeza kuti ndi choona. Kodi inu mwapeza chomwe adakulonjezani Ambuye wanu kuti ndi choona?” Iwo adzati: Inde. Ndipo wofuula adzanena pakati pawo: “Matemberero a Mulungu ali pa anthu olakwa.”
